name: saruAOT
description:
saruAOT

prototype attack on titan fan game

buggy, watch out!

follow the development on my twitter

current features
  • 3DMG functionality
  • basic titan AI
  • crawlers
  • gas and blade health mechanics
  • wave survival map
  • small training room
planned features
  • scenarios
  • sound
  • player customization
  • randomized titan appearance
  • more titan types
  • skills
  • multiplayer

unplanned:

  • shifting
  • pvp
